Post.title: Koa
Post.content:
Koa Webnode

nodenode

  1. http

    node base.js

    localhost:3000 Not Found

  2. koa-static

    node base-static.js

    localhost:3000

  3. koa-router

    routerrestful api

    app.use(router.routes()); koa

    app.use(router.allowedMethods()); getpost,put,delete404405

  4. // ctx.redirect('getTokens'); 302

  5. error ctx.throw(500); app.on('error',(err, ctx)=>{ // handle })

Post.title: git
Post._content:
[git](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/896043488029600) * `git init` > git * `git remote add origin ` > * `git clone` > * `git checkout -b ` or `git switch -c ` > pr-branch * `git checkout -b origin/` > remote-branchnew-branch * ` git commit` > * `git pull` > * `git push` > * `git merge c2` > c2 branch * `git rebase c2` > c2 * `git checkout c2^` > HEADc2 * `git checkout c2~2` > c2 * `git branch -f c2 HEAD~2` > c2 * `git reset HEAD~1` > * `git revert HEAD` > * `git push -u origin master` > masteroriginorigingit push * `git pull` > git fetch, git merge * `git pull --rebase` > git fetch , git rebase merge commit * `rebase` 
rebase
    
    merge mergeadd commit 
    rebase rebase,
    ,addgit rebase continuegit rebase skip
* `git stash` > gitcommit * `git stash list` > * `git stash apply stash@{0}` > commit * `git stash pop` > commit * `git stash drop stash@{0}` > * `git cherry-pick 4c805e2` > * `git tag ? ` > `HEAD`commit id * `git tag -a -m "This is a tag"` > * `git tag` > * `git show ` > * `git tag -d ` > * `git push origin ` > * `git push origin --tags` > * `git push origin :refs/tags/` >

Post.title: karma
Post.raw:
---
title: karma 
date: 2021-01-25 11:33:24
tags:
categories:
---

- es6

  - `npm install karma-coverage-istanbul-instrumenter karma-coverage-istanbul-reporter -D`

  - karma.conf.js

    ```js
    preprocessors: {
        'webapp/controller/*.js': ['karma-coverage-istanbul-instrumenter'] // es6
    },
    coverageIstanbulInstrumenter: {
        esModules: false
    },
    reporters: ['progress', 'coverage-istanbul'],
    coverageIstanbulReporter: {
        dir: './target/coverage',
        includeAllSources: true,
        // xmlcoberturahtmlhtml
        reports: ['cobertura', 'lcovonly', 'text-summary'] 
    },
    plugins: ['karma-*']
    ```
Post.content:
• es6

    • npm install karma-coverage-istanbul-instrumenter karma-coverage-istanbul-reporter -D

    • karma.conf.js

Post._content:
# mocha + chai 

 [ Mocha ](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2015/12/a-mocha-tutorial-of-examples.html)
 [chai](https://www.chaijs.com/api/bdd/)

> 

## {}
```js
$ mocha spec/{my,awesome}.js
$ mocha test/unit/*.js
$ mocha 'test/**/*.@(js|jsx)' // node

 ,  mocha test/{cf,}.js 
Warning: Could not find any test files matching pattern: test/{cf}.js
No test files found

```

## mochatest

```js

test/cf/**.js;
test/gg/tt/**.js;
mochatest

mocha --recursive test
```

## (`--reporter``spec`)

```js
$ mocha
# 
$ mocha --reporter spec
```

> `--reporters`

```js
$ mocha --reporters
```

## [`mochawesome`](http://adamgruber.github.io/mochawesome/)HTML

```js
$ npm install --save-dev mochawesome
$ ../node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter mochawesome
```

`mocha``mochawesome`

[`mochaawesome-reports`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo02/mochawesome-reports)

## mocha.opts

Mocha`test``mocha.opts`[`demo03`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/tree/master/demo03)

```js
$ mocha --recursive --reporter tap
```

`--recursive``--reporter tap`

`test`[`mocha.opts`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo03/test/mocha.opts)

```js
--reporter tap
--recursive
```

`mocha`

```js
$ mocha
```

test`mocha.opts`

```js
otherDirTests
--recursive
```

`otherDirTests`

## ES6

ES6Babel[`demo04`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/tree/master/demo04)[`test/add.test.js`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo04/test/add.test.js)ES6

```js
import add from '../src/add.js';
import chai from 'chai';

let expect = chai.expect;

describe('', function() {
  it('1  1  2', function() {
    expect(add(1, 1)).to.be.equal(2);
  });
});
```

ES6Babel

```js
$ npm install babel-core babel-preset-es2015 --save-dev
```

[`.babelrc`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo04/.babelrc)

```js
{
  "presets": [ "es2015" ]
}
```

`--compilers`

```js
$ ../node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register
```

`--compilers``babel-core/register``.js`MochaMocha

> mocha.optspackage.json


### package.json`npm run test`

```js
"scripts": {
    "test": "mocha --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register"
 }
```

--compilers

```js
"scripts": {
    "test": "mocha --recursive --require babel-core/register"
 }
```

### Mocha.opts `mocha`

```js
--reporter spec
--recursive
--compilers js:babel-core/register
```

--compilers

```js
--reporter spec
--recursive
--require babel-core/register
```
Post.raw:

# mocha + chai 

 [ Mocha ](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2015/12/a-mocha-tutorial-of-examples.html)
 [chai](https://www.chaijs.com/api/bdd/)

> 

## {}
```js
$ mocha spec/{my,awesome}.js
$ mocha test/unit/*.js
$ mocha 'test/**/*.@(js|jsx)' // node

 ,  mocha test/{cf,}.js 
Warning: Could not find any test files matching pattern: test/{cf}.js
No test files found

```

## mochatest

```js

test/cf/**.js;
test/gg/tt/**.js;
mochatest

mocha --recursive test
```

## (`--reporter``spec`)

```js
$ mocha
# 
$ mocha --reporter spec
```

> `--reporters`

```js
$ mocha --reporters
```

## [`mochawesome`](http://adamgruber.github.io/mochawesome/)HTML

```js
$ npm install --save-dev mochawesome
$ ../node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter mochawesome
```

`mocha``mochawesome`

[`mochaawesome-reports`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo02/mochawesome-reports)

## mocha.opts

Mocha`test``mocha.opts`[`demo03`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/tree/master/demo03)

```js
$ mocha --recursive --reporter tap
```

`--recursive``--reporter tap`

`test`[`mocha.opts`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo03/test/mocha.opts)

```js
--reporter tap
--recursive
```

`mocha`

```js
$ mocha
```

test`mocha.opts`

```js
otherDirTests
--recursive
```

`otherDirTests`

## ES6

ES6Babel[`demo04`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/tree/master/demo04)[`test/add.test.js`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo04/test/add.test.js)ES6

```js
import add from '../src/add.js';
import chai from 'chai';

let expect = chai.expect;

describe('', function() {
  it('1  1  2', function() {
    expect(add(1, 1)).to.be.equal(2);
  });
});
```

ES6Babel

```js
$ npm install babel-core babel-preset-es2015 --save-dev
```

[`.babelrc`](https://github.com/ruanyf/mocha-demos/blob/master/demo04/.babelrc)

```js
{
  "presets": [ "es2015" ]
}
```

`--compilers`

```js
$ ../node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register
```

`--compilers``babel-core/register``.js`MochaMocha

 }
```

 }

--reporter spec
--recursive

```

--compilers

```js
--reporter spec
--recursive
--require babel-core/register
```

Post.title: linuxnodeJs
Post._content:
1. node

Post.title: npm
Post._content:
> npm install --save-dev  npm install --save,npm

___

> npm node.jsnpm

```js
npm -v
6.4.1
```

> npm

```js
mac: 
	sudo npm install npm -g
window:
	npm install npm -g
```

> npm

```js
npm install <Module Name>
eg: npmnodeexpress
	npm install express
```

expressnode_modules  **require('express')** 

```js
const express = require('express');
```

> 

```js
npm install express -g   # 
```

> 

```js
npm install X:

	- Xnode_modules

	- package.json

	- npm installX
    
npm install X --save:

    - Xnode_modules

    - package.json dependencies X

    - npm installXnode_modules

    - npm install -productionNODE_ENVproductionmsbuild		  node_modules
npm install X --save-dev:

    - Xnode_modules

    - package.json devDependencies X

    - npm installXnode_modules

    - npm install -productionNODE_ENVproductionX			  node_modules
```

> npm install 

```js
--save--save-dev
```

> npm 

```
npm uninstall X
 /node_modules/ 
npm ls
```

> 

```
npm update X
```

### 

>  npm  NPM  NPM  npmjs.org () 10 
>
>  cnpm (gzip )  npm:

```js
npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org
```

 cnpmnpmcnpmnpm

`SYN`(synchronous) 

`ACK`(acknowledgement ) 

`PSH`(push) 

`FIN`(finish) 

`RST`(reset) 

`URG`(urgent)

`Sequence number`(`seq`) 

`Acknowledge number`(`ack`)

4. TCP`ACK=1`ack=y+1seq=x+1TCPESTABLISHED<font color=red>TCPACK</font>
5. ESTABLISHED

3. FIN-WAIT-22<font color=red></font>
